Headline: #56 Milwaukee Temporary Southbound Reroute near Clark/Monroe
ShortDescription: SB 56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Washington, LaSalle and Madison, due to street blockage near Clark/Monroe.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Washington, LaSalle and Madison, due to street blockage near Clark/Monroe.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #9 Ashland & #X9 Ashland Express Temporary Reroute at Ashland/46th
ShortDescription: 9 Ashland & X9 Ashland Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, 43rd, Western, 47th, and Ashland due to, a fire near Ashland/46th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#9 Ashland & #X9 Ashland Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, 43rd, Western, 47th, and Ashland due to, a fire near Ashland/46th.

Headline: Delays Affecting Brown Line Trains
ShortDescription: Brown Line trains are experiencing moving delays leaving Kimball. Expect longer than usual wait times.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line trains are experiencing moving delays leaving Kimball. Expect longer than usual wait times.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Please allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Service Delayed near Roosevelt
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are standing near Roosevelt due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are standing near Roosevelt due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

 At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red line Line Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier unauthorized person on the tracks near Roosevelt. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier unauthorized person on the tracks near Roosevelt. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
